Title: Prohibits a county rent guidelines board from establishing rent adjustments for class A dwelling units based on certain considerations
Summary: Prohibits a county rent guidelines board from establishing rent adjustments for class A dwelling units based on the current rental cost of a unit or on the amount of time that has elapsed since another rent increase was authorized.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-510, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting a county rent guidelines board from establishing rent adjustments for class A dwelling units based on certain considerations
